üöÄ Next Steps to Integrate

Update Flask Routes

# Add to app.py
from flask import Flask, render_template
from flask_login import login_required, current_user
from models_auth import UsageTracking

@app.route('/dashboard')
@login_required
def dashboard():
    usage = UsageTracking.get_or_create_current(current_user.id)
    limits = current_user.get_tier_limits()
    return render_template('auth/dashboard.html', usage=usage, limits=limits)

Test the Flow

  1. Visit /auth/signup ‚Äî Beautiful signup form
  2. Fill form, select tier, create account
  3. Redirects to /dashboard ‚Äî Shows usage stats
  4. Click logout ‚Üí Back to /auth/login
  5. Login again ‚Üí Dashboard

üí° Pro Tips

Password Strength Algorithm

  • Length >= 8: +1
  • Length >= 12: +1
  • Mixed case: +1
  • Has numbers: +1
  • Has symbols: +1

Total Score:

  • 0-2: Weak (red)
  • 3-4: Medium (orange)
  • 5: Strong (green)

Tier Badge Colors

  • Free: Green (#10b981) ‚ÄúStart Here‚Äù
  • Premium: Blue (#1e40af) ‚ÄúPopular‚Äù
  • Pro/Enterprise: No badge
